greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n in which, if the number of parts is k, the product of the parts is the k-th power of some positive integer.
comment: a(n) is the number of integer partitions of n whose geometric mean is an integer. - _Gus Wiseman_, Jul 19 2019
xref: Partitions with integer average are A067538.
Subsets whose geometric mean is an integer are A326027.
The Heinz numbers of these partitions are A326623.
results.author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Jan 27 2002
ext: Terms a(61) onwards from _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 06 2010
